channel.title: Oregon Trail on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Oregon Trail on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: I-84 East (Exit 302) Off Ramp at OR-86
item.description: I-84 East (Exit 302) off ramp at OR-86. Turn right for OR-86 west to (Oregon Trail) Interpretive Center, Richland, OR, and Hells Canyon. Turn left for Baker City access.

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: I-86 West - Exit 61 Offramp at US-91
item.description: I-86 west at Exit 61 offramp, US-91 jct. Use US-91 north for Chubbuck. Use US-91 south for Pocatello. US-91 north is part of the Oregon/California Trail - Goodale Cutoff.

item.title: US-30 East - Oregon Trail/California Trail
item.description: US-30 east in Montpelier, with California and Oregon Trail Auto Tour Route signs.

item.title: US-20 East at US-26 West
item.description: US-20 east at US-26 in downtown Vale. Use US-26 west for Unity and John Day. Use Glenn St. south for Adrian and Lake Owyhee. US-20 and US-26 join eastwards into Idaho.

item.title: I-84 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on I-84 west at the ID-OR state line. The welcome sign on this border has an Oregon Trail theme.
